code: import{createStore,compose,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{loadState,saveState}from'../../localStorage/localStorage';import rootReducers from'../reducers';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var persistedState=loadState();var composeEnhancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var myStore=createStore(rootReducers,persistedState,composeEnhancer(applyMiddleware(thunk)));myStore.subscribe(function(){saveState({canvasPhotos:myStore.getState().canvasPhotos});});export default myStore;
